channel.title: networks on My bits
channel.description: Recent content in networks on My bits

item.title: How to plot miRNA, gene expression and functional analysis together
item.description: This post should show you an easy way to get the following data type integrated into a figure: functional enrichment analysis gene expression data from any technology miRNA expression data from any technology I am using the function isoNetwork from the package isomiRs, that of course is developed by me :) My ego is not that big, it is just I wanted a figure showing that information, and I couldn’t find any at a time, but if you know any, tweet me about it to @lopantano.
